response.raw:
Here is the memo disseminating information on BI tools, reports and metadata enhancements:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To: BI & Analytics Team
From: [Your Name], Senior Business Intelligence Analyst
Date: [Current Date]
Subject: Updates on BI Tools, Reports and Metadata Enhancements

I want to share some important updates regarding our business intelligence capabilities:

BI Tools:
- We have upgraded to the latest version of Tableau, which offers enhanced data visualization and dashboard capabilities. All users should update to Tableau 2022.1 to take advantage of the new features.
- Microsoft Power BI licenses have been expanded. We can now support additional business users who need access to interactive dashboards and self-service analytics. Submit requests for new Power BI licenses to the BI & Analytics Team.

Reports:
- The Q2 Sales Performance dashboard has been updated with the latest sales data and is available on the Analytics Portal. The dashboard includes additional filters and drill-downs by region, product category, and sales rep.
- A new Daily Manufacturing KPIs report is being launched to track real-time production metrics, quality control, and machine utilization. The report will be accessible from the Operations section of the Analytics Portal starting next Monday.

Metadata Enhancements:
- Business glossary terms have been added in the data catalog for key entities in the Sales and Customer subject areas. Definitions are now available for metrics like Monthly Recurring Revenue, Customer Retention Rate, and Sales Pipeline.  
- The data lineage diagram has been expanded to map data flows from source systems to target BI reports and dashboards. This will help users understand the origin and transformations of data used in key reports.

Please reach out to the BI & Analytics Team if you have any questions on these updates or need assistance with our BI tools and reports. We are excited to continue empowering the organization with actionable data insights.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To: BI & Analytics Team
From: [Your Name], Senior Business Intelligence Analyst
Date: [Current Date]
Subject: Updates on BI Tools, Reports and Metadata Enhancements

I want to share some important updates regarding our business intelligence capabilities:

BI Tools:
- We have upgraded to the latest version of Tableau, which offers enhanced data visualization and dashboard capabilities. All users should update to Tableau 2022.1 to take advantage of the new features.
- Microsoft Power BI licenses have been expanded. We can now support additional business users who need access to interactive dashboards and self-service analytics. Submit requests for new Power BI licenses to the BI & Analytics Team.

Reports:
- The Q2 Sales Performance dashboard has been updated with the latest sales data and is available on the Analytics Portal. The dashboard includes additional filters and drill-downs by region, product category, and sales rep.
- A new Daily Manufacturing KPIs report is being launched to track real-time production metrics, quality control, and machine utilization. The report will be accessible from the Operations section of the Analytics Portal starting next Monday.

Metadata Enhancements:
- Business glossary terms have been added in the data catalog for key entities in the Sales and Customer subject areas. Definitions are now available for metrics like Monthly Recurring Revenue, Customer Retention Rate, and Sales Pipeline.  
- The data lineage diagram has been expanded to map data flows from source systems to target BI reports and dashboards. This will help users understand the origin and transformations of data used in key reports.

Please reach out to the BI & Analytics Team if you have any questions on these updates or need assistance with our BI tools and reports. We are excited to continue empowering the organization with actionable data insights.
